resources.string: Files are not sent remotely but are looked up in cloud servers to determine detections.\nLatency: Less than 5 sec/file.\nCost: 0.002$/file

Files will be sent for remote analysis

Static Mode - Uses threat intelligence and machine learning to determine detections.
Latency: Less than 30 sec/file.
Cost: 0.02$/file 
 
Dynamic Mode -In addition to static mode capabilities, simulates file execution behaviour analysis. More accurate than static mode.
Latency: Less than 5 min/file.
Cost: 0.04$/file
